text: oral reading fluency practice text 7
experiencing life
how do you remember a special day or
event from the past do you look at
pictures do you talk about it some of us
try very hard to relive a moment we want
very much to experience it again that's
what our reading will be about
when you think of the word company you
may think of business but company may
also refer to being with other people
for example we can be in the company of
friends and family we can be in the
company of good people and bad people so
we can talk about being in good company
and being in bad company listen for this
word listen and read along silently
which day would you live again would you
want to be in the company of family or
is there another person if possible we
would hold all we could only our hands
are small and our wants are many clear
your mind you can value life by
experiencing it not holding it
listen and repeat after me

not holding it
